name: Maze runner 3D
description:
Ever wondered how good your reflexes are?? Take a joy ride with this fast paced arcade game and put your reflexes to good test!!
It’s a simple game of avoidance. Your little hyper active maze runner auto-scoots through a maze of other squares which you need to avoid.
The goal is to glide along the maze like a snake taking care that the cube does not dash into any obstacles. Try and dodge the cube away from the square blocks and see how long you flow free.
Charge along this endless game and try to beat your own scores!
How to Play:
• Swipe left/right/up/down to move away from obstacles.
Features:
• Endless gameplay
• Simple controls
• Easy to play; hard to master
• Stunning graphics with a bright 3D neon environment
• Atmospheric soundtrack
• Game center integrated
• Impossibly addictive

Are you up to the test?? Can you escape without getting addicted to this extremely challenging gameplay?? Challenge your reflexes and survive the challenge!!
